author: entertainment.ie
title: Man-Cave | Famous chap Colin Farrell joins Mike on this weeks episode of The Manual
text:
Colin Farrell is one of the most popular actors to come from these here shores.
The North Dubliner broke onto the scene 15 years ago as the lead in war flick, Tigerland, and quickly established himself as a leading man of choice for many top tier directors in Hollywood. His career has had many ups and downs, but the Golden Globe winning actor is superb in the beautifully mental The Lobster. He talks to Mike about his work in the film and his career; while Mike makes a case for his most underrated flick. We're not sure he was convinced.
The Lobster is in Irish cinemas this week, and is well worth your time.
Also, subscribe there now below and be sound. GO WAN!
